properties.body:
STRAIT OF SICILY.
TUNISIA TO SICILY.
VESSEL, 10 TO 15 PERSONS ON BOARD, IN NEED OF ASSISTANCE
BETWEEN CAP BON (37-04N 011-04E) AND SICILY. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
INMARSAT-C: 424744220, PHONE: 39 065 908 4527,
39 065 908 4409, FAX: 390 6592 2737,
3906 5908 4793, E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
